thread.title: LiveData to Introduce New Predictive Analytics Application, Exhibit PeriOp Manager Product Line at OR Manager Conference
thread.title_full: LiveData to Introduce New Predictive Analytics Application, Exhibit PeriOp Manager Product Line at OR Manager Conference

author: admin
title: LiveData to Introduce New Predictive Analytics Application, Exhibit PeriOp Manager Product Line at OR Manager Conference
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/5/2015 @ 8:48 AM Companies mentioned in this article: LiveData, Inc. 
CAMBRIDGE, Mass. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- LiveData, Inc. today announced the company’s activities for the OR Manager Conference, Oct. 7-9 in Nashville. In addition to introducing a new predictive analytics solution in its own exhibit booth, the company will be present in the booth of strategic partner KARL STORZ Endoscopy-America. LiveData also is calling attention to the topic of OR analytics, and its role in improving healthcare outcomes, in the conference program. 
WHO : LiveData, Inc. 
WHAT: 2015 OR Manager Conference,the premier conference on managing today’s OR suite. 
WHEN : Oct. 7-9, 2015 
WHERE : Gaylord Opryland, Nashville 
DETAILS : LiveData will participate in OR Manager in two exhibit booths. In its own booth (#1427), the company will introduce LiveData PeriOp Manager Analytics™, a breakthrough application that enables clinicians and administrators to uncover, identify, and target opportunities for improved team coordination and overall performance; and, with the company’s strategic partner KARL STORZ Endoscopy-America ( booth #1412 ) the companies will demonstrate how they integrate their OR technologies to improve team communication, patient safety, and perioperative workflow. 
LiveData also is encouraging clinicians, administrators and OR managers to attend a conference session on the role of analytics in improving surgical outcomes. The subject -- Using Data to Improve Safety, Quality, Efficiency, and Utilization— will be presented by Hector Delgado, Nurse Manager of Perioperative Services for Operating Rooms, PACU, and Special Procedures, Miami VA Healthcare System (a LiveData customer). The session is scheduled forFriday, October 9, 9:45-11am. 
A limited number of editorial appointments are available upon request. Contact Ed Bride, 413-442-7718 ( Ed@edbride-pr.com ) for specifics. 
About the Conference 
Presented by OR Manager magazine, the OR Manager Conference brings together OR managers, directors, business managers and other leaders of the surgical suite for three days to learn, share best practices, and connect with solution providers in person. Registration information is available at http://bit.ly/1JqcnZ0 . 
About LiveData 
LiveData, Inc. is a leading innovator in real-time operational intelligence solutions. The company’s healthcare solutions enable caregivers to optimize the patient’s journey, enabling care teams to efficiently and consistently coordinate the entire patient surgical experience with predictable outcomes. With LiveData’s healthcare solutions, clinical care teams see easy-to-read, graphic displays of the entire surgical process across all patients for a hospital. Leading medical institutions, including Massachusetts General Hospital, Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center, NewYork-Presbyterian Hospital, and Veterans Health Administration facilities have selected LiveData solutions to improve patient safety, team communication, and perioperative efficiency. LiveData is headquartered in Cambridge, Massachusetts. For more information, visit www.livedata.com 
LiveData, LiveData PeriOp Manager, OR-Dashboard, Active Time Out, OR-Schedule Board, Patient Flow, Family Waiting Board, and PeriOp Manager Analytics are trademarks of LiveData, Inc. All other marks are the property of their respective owners, and are used for identification purposes only.
